mapper.select: SELECT PAGE.* FROM ( SELECT DATA.* FROM ( SELECT A.SEQ, A.COURSE_ID, TITLE, A.USER_ID, B.USER_NAME, USER_IP, VIEW_CNT, DATE_FORMAT(IFNULL(A.UPDATE_DATE,A.CREATE_DATE), '%y.%m.%d %H:%i') CREATE_DATE, @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 ROWNUM, IF((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ATTACH WHERE P_SEQ = A.SEQ AND KIND = 'B_DATA') > 0,'Y','N') FILE_YN FROM BOARD_DATA A LEFT OUTER JOIN USER B ON A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID, (SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) NUM WHERE A.COURSE_ID = #{courseId} AND A.TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{findString},'%') ORDER BY SEQ ) DATA ORDER BY SEQ DESC ) PAGE LIMIT #{limitStart},#{limitUnit}
SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM BOARD_DATA A LEFT OUTER JOIN USER B ON A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID WHERE A.COURSE_ID = #{courseId} AND A.TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{findString},'%')

SELECT A.SEQ, A.COURSE_ID, TITLE, CONTENTS, A.USER_ID, B.USER_NAME, USER_IP, VIEW_CNT, DATE_FORMAT(IFNULL(A.UPDATE_DATE,A.CREATE_DATE), '%y.%m.%d %H:%i') CREATE_DATE FROM BOARD_DATA A LEFT OUTER JOIN USER B ON A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID WHERE A.SEQ = #{seq}
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD_DATA SET TITLE = #{title}, CONTENTS = #{contents}, UPDATE_DATE = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE SEQ = #{seq}
